item.description:
Xen'drik Expeditions: Covenant of Light Adventure 4 ? Good Soldiers
Saturday, March 31 5 PM to 10 PM
Hosted by A.V. Wright in the Arena

The four factions have braved the Well of Woe and the Mere of Shattered
Souls. Now they split apart again, each seeking keys to the next part
of the draconic prophecies held in the Caldyn Fragments.
The Covenant of Light is determined not to let the power of the Caldyn
Fragments fall into the wrong hands. But as more and more evidence
comes to light of corruption within their own ranks, it becomes
difficult to be certain of whose hands those are. When adventure comes
seeking them, will they be able to bring the light into the darkness
once more?
A Xen'drik Expeditions adventure for Covenant of Light characters
only. You
can either bring your own level 4 character created through the
Campaign Standards at
http://www.wizards.co... or jump right in
with a provided Fastplay character.
Sign-ups are strongly encouraged, as we can only accept 6 players. To
sign-up, please email A.V. at WRIGHTA [AT] ebnhc [DOT] org

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: Xen'drik Expeditions @ Pandemonium Books: Covenant of Light 4
